rows.name: The details of the request are just as you've heard, mo.

rows.label: tlk00030101_msg0002
rows.name:
You are to retrieve certain goods from a
recently discovered, unexplored sea region, mo.

rows.label: tlk00030101_msg0004
rows.name:
The goods are the goods, mo!
I've paid you, so no pointless snooping, mo!
